description.originalText: Eliza is the most caring, creative and present caregiver that I’ve ever had take care of my kiddos. I can’t recommend them highly enough. Punctual, communicative and proactive in collaborating with my kids on fun activities that stretch their imagination. It took us many years to find a caregiver that worked for our kiddos, and Eliza was the perfect fit. I and my kids always felt 100% safe with them. ❤️

description.displayText: I couldn't give a higher child-care recommendation regarding the qualification, character, and experience of Eliza. As her mother, I have observed her over these many years as she has babysat and educated the many children placed in her care. As I observed her many times in our home as she took diligent, loving, and thoughtful responsibility for her brother or niece, I was overwhelmed with her kindness, respect, and guidance she gave these young children. Eliza's loving nature provided a feeling of calm and trust in them. I was so impressed and touched with seeing her getting down on their level to look them kindly in the eyes as she cheerfully and clearly communicated with them her expectations and enthusiasm. Eliza's supervision and excitement in directing the children to interesting and engaging activities and projects were greatly appreciated, as well. Most importantly, I felt complete peace knowing the children were in safe hands while in her care.

description.displayText:
Eliza is creative, compassionate and completely engaging with children. We've hired her multiple times to babysit our two kids (ages 1 and 5) and they both adored her. With creative activities, games and special books, I knew their time was filled with engagement and joy. Our littlest one felt safe with her, and we had zero worries leaving her at home with our kiddos. 

When our 5 year old said he was scared going to bed, she stayed in his room until we got home (long after he fell asleep) because she said she would!  Eliza's love of children is obvious, and we are always happy to have her spend time with our kids.
